item.title: 美国钴矿商对特朗普说：关税是 "手术刀 "而不是 "大锤
item.description: 钴生产商Jervois Global公司的一位高管周三表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在支持面临中国激烈竞争的美国矿业公司时，应该战略性地而不是直截了当地部署关税。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump should deploy tariffs strategically rather than bluntly as he aims to support American mining companies facing stiff Chinese competition, a senior executive at cobalt producer Jervois Global said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊药店执行官希望小肯尼迪成为盟友
item.description: 亚马逊公司药房部门的首席医疗官希望美国卫生部长提名人小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：The chief medical officer of Amazon.com's pharmacy unit is hopeful that U.S. health secretary nominee Robert F. Kennedy Jr. can be an ally for healthcare companies, he said at a panel at the Reuters NEXT conference in New York on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Elektra 在取消停牌后股价上涨约 20
item.description: 墨西哥陷入困境的金融服务公司和零售商 Elektra 的股票周三上涨了近 20%，在此之前，该公司在当地证券交易所的暂停交易被取消，引发了股价暴跌。【原文：Shares of Mexico's embattled financial services company and retailer Elektra gained nearly 20% on Wednesday, after an earlier suspension on trading on the local stock exchange was lifted triggering a sharp fall.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，阿迪达斯在欧盟税务调查中连续第二天遭到突击搜查
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，调查人员连续第二天对阿迪达斯总部进行了搜查，这是对长达数年之久的调查的最新阶段。【原文：Investigators carried out searches at Adidas's headquarters for a second consecutive day, the Financial Times reported, the latest stage in a years-long probe of what Handelsblatt newspaper reported was 1.1 billion euros of tax damage.】

item.title: 耶伦称美国将对任何货币操纵行为做出 "强烈反应
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周三表示，当有国家试图操纵本国货币以获取竞争优势时，美国将 "做出强烈反应"，但目前并不存在这种市场干预。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Wednesday that the U.S. will "react strongly" when countries try to manipulate their currencies for competitive advantage, but at the moment there is not such market intervention.】

item.title: 埃克森公司首席执行官表示，希望从赫斯-圭亚那资产中获取价值
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司的两位高管周三表示，埃克森美孚希望 "参与 "赫斯公司出售圭亚那石油生产资产的交易，并从其为开发圭亚那近海油田所做的工作中获取价值。【原文：Exxon Mobil want to "participate" in Hess Corp.'s sale of its Guyana oil production assets, and extract value from the work it has put into developing the country's offshore fields, two of its top executives said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 联合健康保险公司（UnitedHealthcare）杀戮事件发生后，医疗保健企业高管试图更好地了解患者的愤怒情绪
item.description: 制药商辉瑞公司和亚马逊公司的高管周三在纽约举行的路透 NEXT 会议的一个小组讨论会上表示，在上周美国一位有权势的医疗保险高管被谋杀后，医疗保健公司正在后退一步，以更好地了解患者的体验。【原文：Health care companies are taking a step back to better understand patients' experiences after a powerful U.S. health insurance executive was murdered last week, executives from drugmaker Pfizer and Amazon.com said at a panel at the Reuters NEXT conference in New York on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价跃升至历史新高
item.description: 特斯拉股价周三攀升至415美元的历史新高，超过了三年多前创下的414.50美元的前期高点，这家电动汽车制造商在美国总统大选后延续了涨势。【原文：Tesla shares climbed to a record high of $415 on Wednesday, topping its prior high of $414.50 set more than three years ago as the electric vehicle maker extended a rally in the wake of the U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称立法者将解散药房福利管理公司，医疗保险公司股票下跌
item.description: 华尔街日报》的一篇报道称，一个由两党议员组成的小组将立法解散药房福利管理公司，此后联合健康（UnitedHealth）和 CVS Health 等医疗保险公司的股价在周三下跌。【原文：Shares of health insurers such as UnitedHealth and CVS Health fell on Wednesday after a Wall Street Journal report said a bipartisan group of lawmakers was set to introduce legislation to break up pharmacy-benefit managers.】

item.title: 另类资产管理公司 TPG 联合创始人大卫-邦德曼去世，享年 82 岁
item.description: 价值 2,390 亿美元的另类资产管理巨头 TPG 的联合创始人大卫-邦德曼（David Bonderman）于周三去世，享年 82 岁。【原文：David Bonderman, the co-founder of the $239 billion alternative asset management giant TPG , has died at the age of 82, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Direxion 推出与帕兰提尔和伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司相关的新杠杆 ETF
item.description: Direxion 周三表示，它已推出与 Palantir Technologies 和沃伦-巴菲特的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司这两只股票挂钩的新杠杆和反向交易所交易基金，交易者有机会获得每只股票每日上涨幅度的两倍，或捕捉每日下跌幅度的反向。【原文：Direxion said on Wednesday that it has launched new leveraged and inverse exchange-traded funds tied to two stocks, Palantir Technologies and Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway that offer traders a chance to get twice the daily upside movement of each stock or capture the inverse of a daily decline.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，好时公司的主要所有者拒绝了 Mondelez 的报价，认为其过低
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，好时公司的主要控股方拒绝了蒙代尔兹国际公司（Mondelez International）的初步收购要约，称其报价过低。【原文：Hershey's main controlling owner has rejected Mondelez International's preliminary takeover offer, terming it as too low, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: -美国银行业高管期待特朗普放宽规则，促进增长
item.description: 路透社 NEXT 会议周三在纽约举行，业内高管在一个小组讨论会上表示，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普有望采取有利于增长的政策，放宽美国银行和信用卡监管，同时促进交易。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump is expected to adopt pro-growth policies that ease U.S. banking and credit card regulations, while spurring deals, industry executives said on a panel at the Reuters NEXT conference in New York on Wednesday.】

item.title: Tinder 母公司 Match 第四季度营收受美元走强影响
item.description: Match Group 周三表示，由于旗舰约会应用 Tinder 用户增长乏力，汇率带来的影响大于预期，该公司第四季度营收将低于此前预期。【原文：Match Group said on Wednesday it would report fourth-quarter revenue below its previous forecast due to a larger-than-anticipated impact from currency exchange rates amid sluggish user growth at its flagship dating app Tinder.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Synopsys 拟出售两项资产，以争取欧盟批准 350 亿美元的 Ansys 交易
item.description: 据三位直接知情人士透露，芯片设计软件公司 Synopsys 已提出在出售自己的一个部门的基础上再出售一个 Ansys 部门，以争取欧盟批准其 350 亿美元收购芯片设计软件公司。【原文：Chip design software company Synopsys has offered to sell an Ansys unit on top of one of its own in a bid to win EU approval for its $35 billion acquisition of the chip design software company, three people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 谷歌将人工智能代理置于双子座更新的中心位置
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）周三发布了第二代人工智能模型 "双子座"（Gemini），并预告了除聊天机器人之外的一系列使用人工智能的新方法，包括通过一副眼镜。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Wednesday released the second generation of its artificial intelligence model Gemini and teased a slate of new ways to use AI beyond chatbots, including through a pair of eyeglasses.】

item.title: 阿根廷通货膨胀率下降，当地人敢于希望最坏的情况已经过去
item.description: 随着阿根廷飙升的通胀率慢慢回落，当地人开始相信经济危机最严重的时期已经过去，并希望物价上涨放缓将导致经济增长和停滞不前的经济活动复苏。【原文：As Argentina's soaring inflation rate slowly returns to earth, locals are starting to believe the worst of a biting economic crisis is over and hoping that slowing price rises will lead to a recovery of growth and stalled activity.】

item.title: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy）在比特币推动下大涨，距离纳斯达克 100 强更近了一步
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy）股价一飞冲天，使这家比特币囤积者在本周的年度改组前成为科技重镇纳斯达克 100 指数的可能候选者。【原文：A meteoric rise in MicroStrategy's shares has made the bitcoin hoarder a likely candidate for the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 index ahead of an annual reshuffle this week.】

item.title: 西门子提议雀巢前首席执行官施耐德自 2027 年起担任监事会主席
item.description: 西门子周三表示，前雀巢和费森尤斯 SE 首席执行官马克-施耐德（Mark Schneider）最迟可能在 2027 年接替吉姆-哈格曼-斯纳布（Jim Hagemann Snabe）担任西门子监事会主席，并提议选举施耐德。【原文：Former Nestle and Fresenius SE CEO Mark Schneider could succeed Jim Hagemann Snabe as chairman of the supervisory board of Siemens by 2027 at the latest, Siemens said on Wednesday, proposing Schneider's election.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回针对英伟达的证券欺诈诉讼案
item.description: 美国最高法院周三回避了是否允许股东继续提起证券欺诈诉讼的决定，该诉讼指控人工智能芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）在其销售额有多少依赖于动荡的加密货币市场方面误导投资者。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court sidestepped on Wednesday a decision on whether to allow shareholders to proceed with a securities fraud lawsuit accusing artificial intelligence chipmaker Nvidia of misleading investors about how much of its sales depended on the volatile cryptocurrency market.】

item.title: 加拿大央行降息 50 个基点，担心特朗普可能征收关税
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 富国银行首席执行官对监管修复表示更有信心
item.description: 富国银行首席执行官查理-沙尔夫（Charlie Scharf）周三表示，在长达数年的假账户丑闻之后，他对该行在解决合规问题方面取得的进展更有信心，并详细介绍了该行在实施风险控制方面所做的努力。【原文：Wells Fargo CEO Charlie Scharf expressed more confidence on Wednesday in the bank's progress to fix compliance problems after its years-long fake accounts scandal, detailing its efforts to implement risk controls.】

item.title: 聚焦：消息人士称，联合信贷银行的 Orcel 在 Banco BPM 被迫出手之前就在谋划竞购事宜
item.description: 两位与此事关系密切的消息人士称，联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 多年来一直在制定收购 Banco BPM 的计划，并几乎准备好扣动扳机。【原文：UniCredit CEO Andrea Orcel has been drawing up plans to take over Banco BPM for years and was almost ready to pull the trigger, two sources close to the matter said.】

item.title: TechInsights 称，华为新款 Mate 70 手机芯片并未进行重大重新设计
item.description: 咨询公司 TechInsights 周三表示，华为新款 Mate 70 智能手机所采用的芯片设计与上一代产品相比仅有 "渐进式改进"，而且与一些预期相反，该芯片采用的是 7 纳米（nm）工艺节点。【原文：Huawei's new Mate 70 smartphone contains a chip whose design shows only an "incremental improvement" over its predecessor and, contrary to some expectations, was made using the 7 nanometer (nm) process node, consultancy TechInsights said on Wednesday.】

item.title: VIEW 11月美国CPI涨幅与上月持平，为12月宽松敞开大门
item.description: 11 月份美国消费者物价增幅为七个月来最大，但在劳动力市场降温的背景下，这不太可能阻止美联储下周第三次降息。【原文：U.S. consumer prices increased by the most in seven months in November, but that is unlikely to discourage the Federal Reserve from cutting interest rates for a third time next week against the backdrop of a cooling labor market.】

item.title: 柴火和萨莫萨"：美国酒店欢迎印度游客热潮以恢复收入
item.description: 由于国内休闲消费不振，东亚国家的需求仍低于大流行前的水平，美国酒店和旅游公司正致力于利用印度游客的激增来增加收入。【原文：U.S. hotels and travel companies are aiming to tap a surge in Indian tourists to boost revenue as domestic leisure spending falters and demand from East Asian countries remains below pre-pandemic levels.】

item.title: Albertsons 在终止兼并竞标后向竞争对手 Kroger 索要数十亿美元
item.description: Albertsons 周三终止了其 250 亿美元与 Kroger 合并的竞标，因为法院阻止了这一交易，Albertsons 还起诉其竞争对手，称其违约导致交易失败。【原文：Albertsons on Wednesday terminated its $25 billion bid to merge with Kroger after courts blocked the deal and sued its rival, alleging a breach of contract that led to the deal's demise.】

item.title: 美国 11 月居民消费价格创七个月来最大涨幅
item.description: 11 月份美国消费者物价增幅为七个月来最大，但在劳动力市场降温的背景下，这不太可能阻止美联储下周第三次降息。【原文：U.S. consumer prices increased by the most in seven months in November, but that is unlikely to discourage the Federal Reserve from cutting interest rates for a third time next week against the backdrop of a cooling labor market.】

item.title: 通用汽车退出 Cruise 将焦点转向扩大机器人轴的挑战
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）决定终止陷入困境的 Cruise 机器人出租车业务，这凸显了仍在竞争中的其他公司所面临的残酷现实：完善技术需要长期的承诺，也需要雄厚的资金。【原文：General Motors' decision to pull the plug on its troubled Cruise robotaxi business highlights the harsh reality facing others still in the race: it requires a long-term commitment to perfect the technology and deep pockets to fund it.】

item.title: 蒙迪艾尔称，在与好时进行交易谈判的报道中，将重点关注附加交易
item.description: 吉百利（Cadbury）的所有者蒙代尔兹公司（Mondelez）周三表示，在宣布一项高达 90 亿美元的股票回购计划时，该公司将把重点放在 "附加 "交易上。【原文：Cadbury-owner Mondelez said on Wednesday it would focus on "bolt-on" deals as it announced an up to $9 billion share buyback program.】
